<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hard to Fool](/Feats.aspx?ID=2501) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You're accustomed to seeing through shifting darkness and bewildering magic. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on Perception checks against illusions as well as to Will saves against [illusions](/Traits.aspx?ID=92) and [shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143) effects.
